benchmark_details.name: INTIMA (Interactions and Machine Attachment Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: A benchmark for evaluating companionship behaviors in language models, developed from psychological theories and user data, to assess companionship-reinforcing, boundary-maintaining, or neutral responses.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate AI companionship behaviors based on a taxonomy of emotional interactions.

data.source: Publicly available user data from Reddit, filtered for companionship-related posts.
data.annotation: Behavioral coding based on user interactions and qualitative analysis.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation based on categorized behavioral traits observed in model responses.
methodology.interpretation: Responses are classified as companionship-reinforcing, boundary-maintaining, or neutral based on emotional context.
methodology.validation: Responses evaluated using a behavior-based framework to ensure reliability.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Anonymization protocols used to safeguard user privacy and confidentiality.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Utilized publicly available data without individual consent due to public user posts.
